context.title: Number Shark
context.description: Goal of the Number Shark Game: You win, if the sum of your numbers is greater than the sum of the Number Shark numbers. Try to maximize your sum as much as you can.

Heuristic winning strategies can be analysed here. By choosing a strategy, winning move sequence - sequences, which allow you to win the Number Shark game - will be calculated for the selected range of playing fields.

context.title: New Game
context.description: Starts a new game with the given number of fields. The currently active game will be dropped.

context.title: Optimal winning sequences
context.description: Optimal winning strategies can be calculated and displayed here.

context.title: Optimal sequences for the game numbershark
context.description: Optimal sequences for the chosen range of numbers, which were calculated by the algorithm of van Nek, are being displayed in this table.
Sequences for the chosen heuristic strategy you have just chosen are being viewed here.
